ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Mechadendrite Prototypes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Establish the foundation for a new class of versatile tendril-like implants called mechadendrites, and create basic proof of concepts to show off their potential. Rigid and firm, these basic constructs are limited but grant invaluable insight into future refinements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Refined Mechadendrite replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Refining upon basic mechadendrites has led into developments into the fundamental structures of mechadendrites allowing for more flexible movement. These improvements have allowed for the possibility of specialising mechadendrites to assist in specific fields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Standard Mechadendrite Templates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design standard mechadendrite templates via the usage of mini-servos and advanced materials. Applying both mini-servo tech and biogel application, standard mechadendrites surpass anything before them ushering in a new era for mechadendrite engineering.
